Page.name: P_Defense
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 Beaver Furs, 2 Silver Ores,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Attack
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Bear Fur, 1 Gold Ore, 1 Tiger Lilly.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Spirit Restoration
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Wine, 2 Blue Star Flowers, 1 Blue Quartz.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Feasting
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Wine, 1 Raw Meat, 1 Vegetable, 1 Fruit.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Body Restoration
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Wine, 2 Sunflowers, 1 Rose Quartz.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Body Restoration

Page.name: P_Harvesting
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 White Rabbit Furs, 3 Lilacs.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Manufacturing
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 Iron Ore, 1 Silver Ore, 1 Sunflower,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Summoning
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Silver Bar, 1 Deer Antlers,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Craft
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Titanium Bar, 2 Blue Quartz, 1 Mead,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Magic
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Polished Ruby, 2 Black Roses, 1 Ale,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Extra_Mana
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of mana or potions of spirit restoration.
30 Ogre Toes, 15 Potions of Spirit Restoration,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Spirit Restoration.

Page.name: P_Extra_Life
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of minor healing or potions of body restoration.
Note: the process produces 30 potions at a time.
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Body Restoration.

Page.name: P_Antidote
Page.text: Removes any current poison from your body.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Rues, 10 Yarrows, 3 Poppies, 4 Ale.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_TS
Page.text: Allows you to see invisible characters.
1 Empty Vial, 1 Deer Antlers, 9 Wormwoods, 7 Toadstools,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of True Sight

Page.name: P_Invis
Page.text: Make your character invisible, except to those
with True Sight. Has 30% chance of poisoning you
1 Empty Vial, 2 Ales, 2 Snow Leopard Furs, 7 Wormwoods
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Accuracy
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to aim attacks.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Skunk Furs, 5 Valerians, 15 Dandelions,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Evasion
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to evade attacks.
1 Empty Vial, 10 Mulleins, 10 Yarrows, 4 Racoon Furs,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Cold
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 5 Polar Bear Furs, 8 Wines, 5 Rubies.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Cold Protection

Page.name: P_Heat
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 8 Air Essences, 8 Water Essences,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Heat Protection

Page.name: P_Rad
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 8 Energy Essences, 8 Air Essences,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Radiation Protection
